description:
There are 2,400 lawyers in Washington State who focus on personal injury law. They all claim to be the best. So how can you know that the law firm of Brett McCandlis Brown in Bellingham is exceptional? Why should you hire us?

We Help People Rebuild Their Lives

Our experience and record of results speak for themselves. For example, our attorneys recovered $5.5 million in one car accident case, the largest jury verdict of its kind in that county...
